mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_temp_stat_stnd.select */ SELECT age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,temp_val_fr /* temp_val_fr 체온_값_FROM numeric */ ,temp_val_to /* temp_val_to 체온_값_TO numeric */ ,temp_stat_cd /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_temp_stat_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND temp_val_fr = #{tempValFr} /* temp_val_fr 체온_값_FROM numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_temp_stat_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_temp_stat_stnd ( age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,temp_val_fr /* temp_val_fr 체온_값_FROM numeric */ ,temp_val_to /* temp_val_to 체온_값_TO numeric */
,temp_stat_cd /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,#{tempValFr} /* temp_val_fr 체온_값_FROM numeric */ ,#{tempValTo} /* temp_val_to 체온_값_TO numeric */
,#{tempStatCd} /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_temp_stat_stnd.update */ UPDATE ti_temp_stat_stnd
,temp_val_to = #{tempValTo} /* temp_val_to 체온_값_TO numeric */
,temp_stat_cd = #{tempStatCd} /* temp_stat_cd 체온_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND temp_val_fr = #{tempValFr} /* temp_val_fr 체온_값_FROM numeric */
